PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-05271998-03-310,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
PrecisReappointment of JEAN THÉRÈSE RILEY, of Toronto, Ontario, as Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Arts Centre Corporation to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective April 25, 1998.
Attachments
precis:
Reappointment of JEAN THÉRÈSE RILEY, of Toronto, Ontario, as Chairperson
of the Board of Trustees of the National Arts Centre Corporation to hold
office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective April 25,
1998.
